ValidationRule.description: If the Activation record is fulfilled, a user is not allowed to edit the activation lines related to it.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Activation__r.Activation_progress__c, "Fulfilled"), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(ISCHANGED(Activation_Fulfilled__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to edit an activation line once the activation is fulfilled.
